text: Robert Mandan (February 2, 1932 - April 29, 2018) was an American actor. He was best known for his role as Chester Tate on the satirical sitcom Soap from 1977 through 1981. Mandan died on April 29, 2018 in Los Angeles, California of prostate cancer at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Missouri
title: Robert Mandan
